Scripts.OnClick: if this:GetParent():GetParent():GetName()=="DPSMate_Details_CompareEDT" then if this:GetParent():GetName()=="DPSMate_Details_CompareEDT_LogCreature" then DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT:SelectCreatureButton(this:GetID(), "Compare") else DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT:SelectDetailsButton(getglobal("DPSMate_Details_CompareEDT_Log_ScrollFrame").index, this:GetID(), "Compare") end else if this:GetParent():GetName()=="DPSMate_Details_EDT_LogCreature" then DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT:SelectCreatureButton(this:GetID(), "") else DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT:SelectDetailsButton(getglobal("DPSMate_Details_EDT_Log_ScrollFrame").index, this:GetID(), "") end end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["close"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["switchgraphsdesc"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["switchindividualsdesc"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: DPSMate_Details_EDT.LastScroll = "" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT.ScrollFrame_Update)
DPSMate_Details_EDT.LastScroll = "" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT.SelectCreatureButton)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(DPSMate.L["close"], nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnMouseWheel: DPSMate_Details_EDT.LastScroll = "Compare" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT.ScrollFrame_Update)
DPSMate_Details_EDT.LastScroll = "Compare" if not this.oset then this.oset = 0 end this.oset = this.oset - arg1 FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(24, DPSMate.Modules.DetailsEDT.SelectCreatureButton)
